name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES Club. With its classic buttons, rocket arms and legs, broken screen, and stylish glasses, RetroBot is a true embodiment of nostalgia and technological prowess. Its unique design evokes memories of the golden age of gaming and computing. Despite its broken screen, RetroBot still manages to fulfill its role as an oscilloscope with unmatched precision and accuracy. As a member of the WebtrES Club, RetroBot is constantly on the lookout for new technologies and innovations to enhance its abilities.
